name: wasm-micro-runtime
description: WebAssembly Micro Runtime (WAMR) is a lightweight standalone WebAssembly (Wasm) runtime with small footprint, high performance and highly configurable features for embedded, IoT and edge computing applications.

aot.description: Build with the Ahead-of-Time compiler support

classic-interpreter.description: Build with the classic interpreter support

fast-interpreter.description: Build with the fast interpreter support

fast-jit.description: Build with the fast JIT support

lib-wasi-threads.description: Build with WASI threads library support

llvm-jit.description: Build with the LLVM JIT support
